org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream

Interface TransformerSupplier<K,V,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type
    V - value type
    R - KeyValue return type (both key and value type can be set arbitrarily)

    @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public interface TransformerSupplier<K,V,R>
    A TransformerSupplier interface which can create one or more Transformer instances.
    See Also:
    Transformer, KStream.transform(TransformerSupplier, String...), ValueTransformer, ValueTransformerSupplier, KStream.transformValues(ValueTransformerSupplier, String...)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transformer<K,V,R> get()
      Return a new Transformer instance.

      • get

        a new Transformer instance
